text: Curschmann is a German surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Karl Friedrich Curschmann (1804-1841), German song composer *Heinrich Curschmann (1846–1910), German internist who was a native of Giessen *Hans Curschmann (1875–1950), German physician and neurologist remembered for Curschmann- Batten-Steinert syndrome ==See also== *Curschmann's spirals, a finding in the sputum of several different lung diseases Category:German-language surnames
title: Curschmann
